A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not even a Star Wars fan\, but I've hated this film that much\, that I wanted to review it. I mean\, I've enjoyed the other movies but this one\, what the hell? it was such a waste of time: sometimes confusing\, sometimes boring\, sometimes wanting to be \"funny\"\, characters neither here nor there\, we never got it. As for my Star Wars fan-friends\, they didn't like it either. I do not understand why there are \"Excellent\" reviews at all. And why good reviews are just \"Good!\"\, \"Brilliant!\"\, \"Excellent!!\". Is Disney\, buying some or ALL of them to balance the score? we'll never now. But believe me\, this one sucked BIG TIME.
